item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

10/24/2011's location will be:

Olde School Saloon and Bistro

I have a confession.... one of my FAVORITE spots in Connecticut is Olde School. (Don't tell the other restaurants now... they might not give us happy hour specials ;D ) It's my goal in life to share this love with everyone.

So many places try 'too hard' to offer something for everyone, and they end up offering a half....baked version of something lame that pleases no one. Not Olde School. They manage to please seemingly every different set of clientele, from gourmet foodies, hipsters, high brow Yale alum, broke yuppies and punks. The staff is great, the food is amazing and the atmosphere is perfect.

Olde School Saloon and Bistro is located at State near Court St, across from the train station. From the vintage copper bar right down to the classic antique punch-button cash register, this is a great place.

The smell of yucca fries with chipotle sauce doesn’t hurt their charm either : )

They have great Monday Night Specials (7pm start):

$8 Miller Light Pitchers

$2 Tallboys (the larger cans of Beer)

$5 Burgers

$5 Pulled Pork Nachos

$5 Dozen Wings

Please RSVP for this event as soon as you know so that I can give them an accurate heads up. If you're only a 'Maybe' please put this in your comment.

The contact for this event is Dev, phone number in RSVP

www.oldeschoolsaloonandbistro.com

P.S. As some of you may know, Meetup does charge the Leadership twice a year for hosting the website.  We do not pass this fee along in any mandatory way, however we will take donations at the 10/10, 10/17, and 10/24 Happy Hours.  Anything you can give towards defraying this cost to keeping the group going will be appreciated!  Thanks!


Hope to see you all there.

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.how_to_find_us: You can contact the listed Host and we're most likely the largest group at the Bar on a Monday.
item.name: Happy Hour: Olde School Saloon and Bistro
